      • getConfirm

        public java.lang.String getConfirm(Form f)
        Description copied from class: FormAction
        should this action be confirmed before execute If this returns null no confirm is required. If not null it is the name of the confirm message in the confirm.properties

        The form is passed to allow a sub-class to trigger confirm based on form parameters.

        Overrides:
        getConfirm in class FormAction
        Parameters:
        f - Form calling action.
        Returns:
        String confirm name
